result.eng: It was difficult to maintain peace in the divided society of Northern Ireland.
result.ga: Bhí sé deacair síocháin a choimeád i sochaí scoilte Thuaisceart na hÉireann
result.orig: Bhí sé deacair síocháin a choimeád i sochaí scoilte Thuaisceart na hÉireann
result.html: Bhí sé deacair síocháin a choimeád i sochaí scoilte Thuaisceart na hÉireannIt was difficult to maintain peace in the divided society of Northern Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé deacair síoċáin a ċoimeád i soċaí scoilte Ṫuaisceart na hÉireannIt was difficult to maintain peace in the divided society of Northern Ireland.

result.ga: Rachaidh muid go dtí an tuaisceart
result.orig: Rachaidh muid go dtí an tuaisceart
result.html: Rachaidh muid go dtí an tuaisceartWe'll go to the north.
result.ponchtml: Raċaiḋ muid go dtí an tuaisceartWe'll go to the north.

result.eng: We liked Northern Ireland, the local people were very friendly.
result.ga: Thaitin Tuaisceart na hÉireann linn bhí muintir na háite an-chairdiúil
result.orig: Thaitin Tuaisceart na hÉireann linn bhí muintir na háite an-chairdiúil
result.html: Thaitin Tuaisceart na hÉireann linn bhí muintir na háite an-chairdiúilWe liked Northern Ireland, the local people were very friendly.
result.ponchtml: Ṫaitin Tuaisceart na hÉireann linn ḃí muintir na háite an-ċairdiúilWe liked Northern Ireland, the local people were very friendly.

result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí sa tuaisceart
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí sa tuaisceart
result.html: Tá mé i mo chónaí sa tuaisceartI live in the north.
